feature_short_description: Access to REST API for programmatic integration with external systems
feature_description:
## API Access

API Access enables your organization to integrate Invoice Scanner directly with external applications and systems through our comprehensive REST API.

### Capabilities
- Programmatic invoice submission and retrieval
- Automated workflow integration
- Real-time data synchronization
- Webhook support for event notifications
- OAuth 2.0 authentication

### Use Cases
- Connect accounting software (QuickBooks, Xero, etc.)
- Integrate with ERp systems
- Build custom automation workflows
- Enable third-party application integrations

### Documentation
Full API documentation is available at `/api/docs`
